Tom Penn recaps the Timberwolves' roster changes, which include the additions of Jimmy Butler, Jeff Teague and now Taj Gibson. (1:12)

When Tom Thibodeau came back to the NBA as head coach and president of the Minnesota Timberwolves after a sabbatical year studying teams around the league, he spoke of fresh perspectives and new ideas. But his actions have shown this version of
